title: Doggedness
excerpt: There’s an element of creative recklessness that goes with true perseverance. Which is what discerns it from mere endurance.

children.text: There’s an element of creative recklessness that goes with true perseverance. Which is what discerns it from mere endurance.
That’s why grit is a virtue, whereas ‘a concentrated effort,’ while noble, is not.
Perhaps that’s why the most successful are the one’s who go above or below or around their problems, but never think to give up.
